item.title: Tabular icebergs form through a process that's a bit like a fingernail growing too long and cracking off at the end. They're often rectangular and geometric as a result, like this one captured on October 16, 2018 in a NASA IceBridge flight [source: https://t.co/pLopXpceLm] https://t.co/gi7XnbtYia

item.title:
If some ill-intentioned person can produce an evil AGI, then large groups of well-intentioned, well-funded, and well-organized people can produce AI systems that are specialized in taking down evil AGIs. Call it the AGI police.
No need to bomb data centers.
